text: Map of Russia with Tambov Oblast highlighted This is a list of rural localities in Tambov Oblast. Tambov Oblast (, Tambovskaya oblast) is a federal subject of Russia (an oblast). Its administrative center is the city of Tambov. As of the 2010 Census, its population was 1,091,994. * Alexandrovka * Bondari * Bukari * Donskoye * Fonovka * Gavrilovka 2-ya * Glazok * Inokovka * Kotovskoye * Lavrovo * Lvovo * Mozdok * Petrovskoye * Pichayevo * Sampur * Satinka * Satino * Shapkino * Staroyuryevo * Usovo == See also == * * Lists of rural localities in Russia == References == * Tambov Oblast
title: List of rural localities in Tambov Oblast
